( Carnage: I will not be able to post after this one until some frequent time this weekend. My grandmother is now too sick for me to leave her. I have only taken this opportunity to return home to collect some things and reply this last time until the weekend. Sorry if this seems inconvenient.)

* Dinobot growled as a sudden sent came to his snout, it was not that of prey but that of a bot who wasn't sure of herself. It was the sent of Tavatron's doubt.
He growled, if he could smell it then what could stop the prey from sensing it? It was a doubtful situation and he only hoped that Tavatron could calm and regain faith in herself soon, he was far to hungry for his dinner plans to ruined by the doubt of another.
Dinobot watched as Tavatron moved deeper into the undergrowth of the forest, he too soon began to move off but keeping in mind to stick to the shadows. Either that or be sighted by his stalked prey!
But just as he hoped that this hunt would be successful he also hoped that his prey would be no smaller then an elk, or even a cow/moose if he could help it. They were large and there was more then enough for two, but it was also the challenge as well!
Dinobot moved in and out of dark shrubs, twining around trees and silently leaping their over sized roots.
As he was nearing a small stream he suddenly stopped, there was the smell of fresh blood in the air!
He glanced about and soon began to follow the sent of the wounded prey, he sniffed and tested the air with his senses. It was near, and it was big!*
